channel.title: Colorado Springs Colorado on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Colorado Springs Colorado on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Writing up a (fire) storm
item.description: Since yesterday, thousands of people have read my brief account of the Black Forest Fire. I tried to include enough maps that someone far away from the fire (like me) would find some context for it that made sense, and enough detailed links to more local reporting and official sources that someone nearby would be able to get to the resource that had more current and on-the-spot coverage than I could ever do.
